actions.text: Amendment SA 213 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 74.

Amendment SA 213 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Johnson WI. (consideration: CR S2292-2296; text: CR S2292) To force Congress to ensure the solvency of the Social Security and Medicare programs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 213 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 74.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 213 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 74.

purpose: To force Congress to ensure the solvency of the Social Security and Medicare programs.
